item.title: Live Reload Golang Development With Gin
item.description: Coming from NodeJS land, I’m always relying on Nodemon to have live-reload my development server while developing. Long story short, I got a project that uses Golang as a drop-in replacement, and reloading the development server is PITA. I need to restart my development server every time I have changed inside my code.
